title: I Miss Old Sion. Was a Rework Necessary?
body:
In My Opinion....

I want old Sion back They should of made a new champ instead of re-working a champion.

replies.body: They always do this, they make a completely new champion and just slap the old ones' name on it. Very annoying. RIP Karma shield nukes.
QQ i loved ADC old sion
You are not giving any sort of information to contrast this topic at all.
